basics.name: EXECUTIVE CHEF
basics.label: Executive Chef
basics.summary: Award winning executive chef with comprehensive experience in kitchen, banquets, and a-la-carte operations, for hotels, resorts and restaurants.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Flagship Restaurant to promote Harris Ranch Agricultural products; Food and Beverage Revenue 13 million, 500,000+ guests per year.
highlights: Created new revenue streams through Culinary Classes for the public.
Accountable for culinary department including overall customer satisfaction.

work.name: Company Name
